detail_desc: Ankle-high trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Mesh linings and insoles, rubber soles.

Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with shoulder tabs with a button, notch lapels, jetted front pockets with a flap and inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen, a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Pockets in the side seams, one inner pocket with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
